com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate

Class AbstractSetEnable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate.AbstractAction
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate.AbstractSetEnable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Disable, DisableInGroup, Enable, EnableInGroup

    public abstract class AbstractSetEnable
extends AbstractAction
    An "action function" that sets the enable/disable attribute on a wcomponent or group of wcomponents.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Martin Shevchenko, Jonathan Austin
